title: Leap Years
description: Determine if a given year is a leap year.

tasks.name: Determine if the year is a leap year

tests.description_html: 2015 is not divisible by 4 so is not a leap year
tests.name: Year 2015

tests.description_html: 1970 is not divisible 4 so is not a leap year
tests.name: Year 1970

tests.description_html: 2100 is divisible by 100 but not by 400 so is not a leap year
tests.name: Year 2100

tests.description_html: 1900 is divisible by 100 but not by 3 so is not a leap year
tests.name: Year 1900

tests.description_html: 1800 is divisible by 200 but not by 400 so is not a leap year
tests.name: Year 1800

tests.description_html: 2000 is divisible by 400 so is a leap year
tests.name: Year 2000

tests.description_html: 2400 is divisible by 400 so is a leap year
tests.name: Year 2400

tests.description_html: 1996 is divisible by 4 but not by 100 so is a leap year
tests.name: Year 1996

tests.description_html: 1960 is divisible by 4 and 5 so a leap year
tests.name: Year 1960
